short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Corrects How Medium.com displays RTL languages like Arabic and Osmanli Turkish.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An open-source extension that corrects how Medium.com renders and displays RTL languages' text such as: Arabic, Osmanli Turkish, and Urdu.

This extension use a simple approach to override some of the CSS classes, nothing beyond that.

Source code: https://github.com/MukhtarSayedSaleh/medium-rtl-support
